description: True positive: docs claim ${env:VAR} but impl only uses process.env

input.diffText:
--- a/docs/config.md
+++ b/docs/config.md
@@ -1,2 +1,5 @@
 ## Configuration
+
+Use `${env:DB_HOST}` and `${env:DB_PORT}` to inject environment variables
+into your configuration file.

fileContents.src/config.ts:
const host = process.env.DB_HOST ?? 'localhost';
const port = process.env.DB_PORT ?? '5432';
